body:
[Efrim, Coffee Grinder]: A strong aroma of coffee is filling the room. It seems to be coming from this guy and his weird contramption 

 [1]: "Hello" 
 [2]: "Hey, it does smell good here, huh?" 
 [3]: "Hello sir, do you, by any chance, have some spare coffee?" 
 [4]: "What is that weird thing?" 
[5] [Leave the person alone]
title: Start1

body:
[Efrim, Coffee Grinder]: "Oh, hello" 

[1] "Do you know me?" 
[2] "Do you know where I am?" 
[3] "Okay then, I'll leave you alone." [Leave]
title: Hey

body:
[Efrim, Coffee Grinder]: "Oh, yeah, i was grinding some coffee. it turned out really good, but i've used my last *beans*..." 

[1] "Hey, i kinda need some coffee, could you give me some, please?" 
[2] "Oh, does anybody else have those *coffee beans*?" 
[3] "Yeah, that's cool. See ya " [Leave]
title: smell

body:
[Efrim, Coffee Grinder]: "Ah, sorry, not only i'm all out of coffee beans, but i've just drunk my last cup as well" 

[1] "Hey, i kinda need some coffee, could you give me some, please?" 
[2] "Oh, does anybody else have those *coffee beans*?" 
[3] "Yeah, that's cool. See ya " [Leave]
title: coffee
